title: Looking for Diamond player for some help and advice! Im Gold :-)
body: Diamond players please at my acc Harpii in game, have a few thing I would like to ask a god player :)

replies.body: Hmu and I'll see what I can do. ✌

> [{quoted}](name=Star,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=pIy2Ig8e,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-12T07:01:16.460+0000)
>
> Hmu and I'll see what I can do. ✌

Can I add you ingame? :) I'm Plat 5 and would love some advice
Sure, I don't mind. I haven't been on as much in the last few days cause I've been sick, but send me a message if you see me online!
